mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SHORTFORM_USERS ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT USERNAME FROM SHORTFORM_USERS WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
SELECT MAIL FROM SHORTFORM_USERS WHERE MAIL = #{mail}

SELECT u.ID, u.USERNAME, u.MAIL, u.PROFILE_IMG, u.PROFILE_IMG_SRC, u.BIO, u.MENTION, u.CREATE_AT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHORTFORM_USERS_FOLLOWS WHERE FOLLOWED_USER_ID = u.ID) AS FOLLOWER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHORTFORM_USERS_FOLLOWS WHERE FOLLOW_USER_ID = u.ID) AS FOLLOWING_COUNT, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(VIDEO_VIEWS), 0) FROM SHORTFORM_VIDEOS WHERE UPLOADER_USER_ID = u.ID) AS TOTAL_VIEWS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHORTFORM_VIDEO_LIKES vl JOIN SHORTFORM_VIDEOS v ON v.ID = vl.LIKE_VIDEO_ID WHERE v.UPLOADER_USER_ID = u.ID) AS TOTAL_LIKES FROM SHORTFORM_USERS u WHERE u.ID = #{id}

SELECT u.ID, u.USERNAME, u.PROFILE_IMG, u.PROFILE_IMG_SRC, u.MENTION, f.CREATE_AT as FOLLOWED_AT FROM SHORTFORM_USERS_FOLLOWS f JOIN SHORTFORM_USERS u ON f.FOLLOW_USER_ID = u.ID WHERE f.FOLLOWED_USER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY f.CREATE_AT DESC

SELECT u.ID, u.USERNAME, u.PROFILE_IMG_SRC, u.MENTION, f.CREATE_AT as FOLLOWED_AT FROM SHORTFORM_USERS_FOLLOWS f JOIN SHORTFORM_USERS u ON f.FOLLOWED_USER_ID = u.ID WHERE f.FOLLOW_USER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY f.CREATE_AT DESC
